DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is assess the efficacy and safety of single and multiple applications of the FS-67 patch in the treatment of ankle sprain in pediatric population (ages 13-17).
DOC.brief_title: FS-67 in the Treatment of Pediatric Patients With Ankle Sprain
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of FS-67 Patches in Adolescent Subjects With Ankle Sprain
DOC.criteria: Grade 1 or Grade 2 ankle sprain Pregnancy or lactation
